EndTime.description: The end of the time frame for which to retrieve traces.

FilterExpression.description: Specify a filter expression to retrieve trace summaries for services or requests that meet certain requirements.

NextToken.description: Specify the pagination token returned by a previous request to retrieve the next page of results.

Sampling.description: Set to true to get summaries for only a subset of available traces.

StartTime.description: The start of the time frame for which to retrieve traces.
